trainers.description: This is a "one item" dialog fillin trainer and lesson. the solutions are **'spielen'** and {as alternative} **'herumtollen'**

items.learn_language_text: Weißt **du** wie viel "Mücklein" ((*spielen|*herumtollen)) in der heißen Sonnenglut?
items.display_language_text: Do **you** know how many "mosquitos" are playing in the blazing heat of the sun?
items.info_text: And here comes **another line** from the "classic German childrens' sleep song"
